thoughts.text: Berlitz offers language courses in English, Spanish, French, German, Arabic, Russian, Mandarin, Portuguese, Italian, Japanese, Korean, American Sign Language (ASL), and other languages. They offer courses for adults, kids and teens, online and in-person courses, private and group lessons, as well as corporate language training, language testing, and culture training. I should now compare the programs and services offered by these top language schools to decide which one to pursue first.
